8.ABOUT:
CHAO/S is a Unique Machine learning based OR solver. We have built a patented AI based tool (ChAOS) to reduce power consumption in caustic soda plants by 1-2%. The tool has been productised and can be deployed at any site in 2-3 weeks. This multi variate multiple third degree polynomial equations can not be solved by Simplex based excel solver OR by any off the shelf optimization research solvers such as Gurobi, Baron The reason for the same is because it requires n number of iter goes beyond what an OR solver can do. Hence we use power of machine learning to reduce the solution scope and thereby solve
 classically unsolved optimization problems.

0.ABOUT: Decipad revolutionizes the way individuals and teams interact with numbers by offering an intuitive, low-code platform for data modeling and interactive storytelling. Its smart document environment, akin to a virtual notebook, effortlessly blends text, formulas, and visualizations, enabling users to express numbers with meaning and foster a deeper understanding across the team. Decipad's natural langu.ge processing and low-code blocks make modeling both fun and powerful, allowing for a human-centric approach to formulating variables and equations. Beyond mere data representation, Decipad empowers users to craft scenarios, present playable stories, and drive richer engagement with both team members and customers. Whether you are a student, teacher, founder, or a professional, Decipad invites you to explore the world of numbers in a playful, meaningful, and collaborative way, transforming static data into interactive narratives that inspire action and communicate value effectively

4.ABOUT:
AES Drive provides a simple way to secure files by always keeping them encrypted on disk, while still allowing access to the decrypted versions through a mounted virtual drive. When the drive is mounted files are encrypted and decrypted transparently, allowing you to work with your files as if they were not encrypted. The full range of standard file operations are supported including create, read, update, and delete. No plaintext data ever touches the disk, all file data is stored eis only accessible while the drive is mounted.
 

 • Easy – To – Use 
 • Secure Connection
 • Outstanding Technical Support
 

 Product Features
 

 • Strong XTS-AES 256 encryption maintains file security at all times.
 • Use your favorite file manager, such as Windows Explorer.
 • Portable file format allows off-site backups and migration between systems.
 • Quickly mount and dismount drives to access and protect encrypted content at any time.
 • Optional session timeout to automatically protect drives.
 • Publicly documented file format based on standard algorithms avoids vendor lock-in.
 

 For more detailed information regarding the product and the features it supports you can always check out our website: https://www.nsoftware.com/drive/aes/

19.ABOUT:
Users can opt for this utility to export Gmail emails to PST, PDF, MBOX, EML, CSV, and various other file formats. Moreover, it also facilitates to transfer of Gmail emails to Yahoo Mail, Office 365, Thunderbird, iCloud, etc. It is designed and developed with the latest algorithm that makes it compatible with all the latest Windows OS. Additionally, it has an easy-to-use and self-explanatory user interface which makes it a standalone utility. It is designed with an advanced algorso allows users to download and migrate the other data including, contacts, calendars, drives, etc.
 

 Detailed Stepwise Working to Backup Gmail Emails.
 

 1. You just need to install and Run this Gmail Backup Software as an administrator. 
 2. After that, enter the login credentials of your Gmail account. Here, you have to use the Third-party app password to backup your Gmail data using this software. 
 3. Now, from the next wizard, select the data items that you want to backup. It gives you the option of selecting mail, calendar, contact, photos, and drives. 
 4. In the next step, you will see the tree structure of your Gmail emails n case you select the Mail option.
 5. Check on the desired folders that you want to backup/migrate and proceed to the next step. 
 6. You can select the resultant file formats/email clients from the dropdown menu of the Save/Backup/Migrate As option. 
 7. It also allows you to opt for advanced options to optimize the entire process. 
 8. After that, specify the Destination Path and click on the Convert button to start the backup process.

0.ABOUT:
That’s why we’re launching our new Forcepoint FlexEdge Secure SD-WAN series of products. It integrates application-centric SD-WAN with our proven network security and intrusion prevention technologies to simplify connectivity and network security for branch offices and remote sites of all sizes, even at global scale. Its converged architecture enables businesses and government agencies to accelerate performance for accessing cloud applications, protect machine-to-machine communication between b.anches and internal systems, and future-proof their operations by transitioning to a SASE architecture
 

 With FlexEdge, hundreds or even thousands of sites can be managed from a single set of policies in a centralized console. It enables distributed enterprises and governments to use private MPLS, local internet broadband and mobile links together and automatically use the right links for the right applications.
 

 Forcepoint FlexEdge Secure SD-WAN diagram
 

 It also builds in cutting-edge intrusion protection that is depended upon by businesses and government agencies around the world to keep advanced threats out and protect automated line-of-business communications such as traffic from point-of-sale terminals or IoT devices back to internal systems. In addition, we’re tightly integrating FlexEdge with our Security Service Edge (SSE) cloud platform, Forcepoint ONE, to protect people working at remote sites as they use web, cloud, and private applications.
 

 Think of it this way: The combination of FlexEdge Secure SD-WAN and Forcepoint ONE will make deploying SASE and Zero Trust much easier. More about that later.
 

 FlexEdge Secure SD-WAN is available immediately in the Americas through Forcepoint’s international network of resellers. If you’re at RSA Conference 2022, stop by our booth, N-5965, to see the many things it can do. You can learn more or request a demo on our FlexEdge Secure SD-WANF web page.

2.ABOUT:
Unified Remix enables you to use a playlist to mix clips from various origins into a single stream and deliver to all devices with no discontinuity. Think of Unified Remix as a just-in-time video-editing suite. Streams can be personalized in any arrangement: ‚úì A video stream for each viewer. ‚úì Video streams to groups of viewers (for example, according to geolocation or subscriptions). ‚úì Single stream for all viewers. Product perks ‚úì Creates any clip, accommodating promos, pre-roll., mid-rolls, and post-rolls
‚úì Conditions content for third-party ad insertion
‚úì Changes are made server-side, without impacting devices or apps
‚úì Reduces buffering times since no content stitching is at the player
‚úì Easy to integrate into any workflow and CMS

Add a promo, output conditioned manifests and media segments, and ready your VOD content for ad insertion. Unified Remix takes an innovative approach by doing content stitching upstream from the origin server. 
Other use cases include stream personalization, pre-rolls, mid-rolls, post-rolls and nPVR. Plus, many other interesting cases are in store.

Key features

‚úì Remix content with a playlist (mixes clips from various origins into a single stream).
‚úì Can work everywhere (eliminates need to manipulate manifests).
‚úì Fits seamlessly into existing workflows (removes player SDK requirement).
‚úì Accommodates content protection (supports all major DRM systems).

How Unified Remix works

As a playlist-resolving software engine, Unified Remix uses a playlist on the server-side, removing all decision logic from the player. Unified Remix bases the playlist on a general ruleset triggered by a CMS, a recommendation system, or other business rules. It then transforms the remixed MP4 playlist into input for Unified Origin and Unified Packager, both of which can deliver all playout formats. The result: a unified approach to delivering to all devices from a single playlist.

————————————————————————————————
❓ WHAT IS BULKMAIL?
With Gmail™ you can manually send hundreds of emails to different recipients. 
If you need to send a similar email with a variable field or image to many recipients, BulkMail can automate that task. Like. sending Certificate, Greeting, Notification, Update, Results etc
You write your message, as usual, in a Gmail™ draft,  add the list of recipients in sheet and BulkMail will send your message to all of them.

————————————————————————————————
🤔 Why use BulkMail and not others?
BulkMail is using only google sheet based function for all tasks, No any external API or other thing. It is a pure Google Sheet based add-on with Full Customization, Security, Flexibility, Transparency and Privacy.


👇 Read more about pricing, quota, features, support,.

————————————————————————————————
🎯 6-STEPS TUTORIAL:
After Installation Go to Sheet and from Add-ons menu Go To BulkMail and Click refresh. It is required to enable BulkMail for that sheet. 

1️⃣ Prepare Design
Option-1: Create a new draft in Gmail™
Option-2: Use Design of Received Email
Option-3: Write HTML code
optionally add merge fields like {First Name} for the merge field to personalize your email. You can also use {Image} to place a variable image for each email from Google Drive.
👉 Then Open Sheet Go to BulkMail> Configure and go to 1st option. Choose suitable option and click save to save HTML code in sheet
2️⃣ Select Design (HTML): Select Design which you saved in the sheet in the 1st step which will be used for email sending.
3️⃣ (Optional) You can Send Test email to yourself for any row
4️⃣ (Optional) Set Email Tracking ,
5️⃣ (Optional) Unsubcribe setting,

6️⃣ Click Run: BulkMail will automatically send your message to each recipient and track your email campaign (opens, unsubscribes etc)

————————————————————————————————
🔒SECURITY/Privacy
BulkMail is completely running on Google. 100% data will remain in Google Sheets. No data will be shared outside Google. Your list of recipients stays in your spreadsheets, your email content stays in Gmail™.

————————————————————————————————
🆘 Support 
Email us admin@clinchscript.com and our team will get back to you shortly!

•	Send Personalized Emails from Gmail with Google Sheet

•	Get HTML of Received Email and use as a template

Note: Due to a recent update in Policy. Try to skip adding sender name and reply To email addresses while using BulkMail. (or any other mail merge tool). Leave those columns blank Otherwise your email may go to spam or not deliver.

5.ABOUT:
Sheet Director add-on helps to manage and control bi-directional data flow between Google Sheets and from G Suite, CRM, Accounting, Productivity, Marketing, Payment, Time Tracking, Ticketing, Social etc apps. Sheet Director supports 45+ apps across various categories. KEY FEATURES ► Manage Services - manage multiple services from single Google Sheet connecting to several Apps. These services can be listed, edited, executed and deleted. ► Connect with Apps through various authenhanisms (key, oAuth1, oAuth2, etc).

►  Bi directional data flow - Query (pull) and Post (push) service types

►  Query Apps to pull data and present results into Google Sheet

►  Comprehensive Query features - field selection, custom filters, sorting, limit results etc.

► Choose or create the destination sheet and start cell 

►  Prepare and Post data from Google Sheets into Apps

► Conditional Posting - Post your records to Apps when it meets your own custom conditions

►  Manual and automatic (scheduled) execution of services -  Set monthly, weekly, daily, or hourly refreshes and automate your services.

► Success notification with a templated email message

► Error notification is sent when there is a failure in processing the configured services.

► Execution Logs to monitor automated executions



Automate your day-to-day reporting with awesome dashboard, visualizations from cross-platform/app data mashups.

Sheet Director is a great API Connector/ Integrator and the best alternative/ complementary to Zapier, Supermetrics, Automate.io, Workato, SheetsGo, JSON Importer, etc.


APPLICATIONS AND SERVICES

Below are the applications supported along with services offered. Remember that there is no limit to your creativity to use Sheet Director wherever you feel it fits and whatever use cases that you may have.


֍ G Suite Apps to Google Sheets:

► Google Sheets
➥ Distribute - Segment data from a source sheet and send that data across 'n' number of sheets based on configuration.
➥ Backup - Take back up of Google Sheets by cloning/ copying into the preset folder.

►  Email
➥ Send Email - Send contents from a Google Sheet as PDF and Inline table to the client via Email.
➥ Mail Merge - Send emails by merging data from Google Sheets with a templated email message


► Google Drive to Google Sheets
➥ List File -Select a folder from google drive and list all files in it inside a Google sheet.

► Google Calendar to Google Sheets 
➥ Get Events - Query and pull calendar events from Google Calendar  into Google Sheets.
➥ Post Events - Post Google Sheet data into calendar to create Calendar events.


► Google Tasks to Google Sheets
➥ Get Tasks - Pull all tasks from Google Tasks and present it in Google Sheets.
➥ Post Tasks - Post data from Google Sheets to Google Tasks

► Google Contacts to Google Sheets
➥ Get Contacts - Pull all contacts from Google contacts into Google Sheets.
➥ Post Contacts - Push data from Google Sheets into Google Contacts.
